options.content:
## How to
1. Choose your `target_file` and `compared_target_file` to analyze
2. Then top panel will be updated and show t4dataset
3. You can check target topic to be compared

## design
- to compare

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  label,
  CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) > 0 
    THEN CAST(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS DOUBLE) / COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN'))
    ELSE 0
  END AS tpr
FROM 
  view_eval_flat
WHERE
  ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range )
GROUP BY 
  label
ORDER BY 
  label;

panels.title: Total TP rate within ${max_eval_range} [m] with target data

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  label,
  CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) > 0 
    THEN CAST(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS DOUBLE) / COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN'))
    ELSE 0
  END AS tpr
FROM 
  view_eval_flat_comp
WHERE
  ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range )
GROUP BY 
  label
ORDER BY 
  label;

panels.title: Total TP rate within ${max_eval_range} [m] with compared data

targets.rawSql:
${view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic:raw}
${view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic_c:raw}

WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    distance_bin,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)
      ELSE 0
    END AS tpr,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)
      ELSE 0
    END AS fpr
  FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic
  WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:singlequate}
  GROUP BY distance_bin
),
comp AS (
  SELECT
    distance_bin,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)
      ELSE 0
    END AS tpr_comp,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)
      ELSE 0
    END AS fpr_comp
  FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic_c
  WHERE ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:singlequate}
  GROUP BY distance_bin
)
SELECT
  b.distance_bin,
  b.tpr AS tp_rate_before,
  -- b.fpr,
  c.tpr_comp AS tp_rate_after,
  -- c.fpr_comp,
  (c.tpr_comp - b.tpr) AS tp_rate_diff,
  -- (c.fpr_comp - b.fpr) AS fpr_diff
FROM base b
JOIN comp c USING (distance_bin)
ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(b.distance_bin, ',', 1), '[', ' ') AS INTEGER);

panels.title: TPrate and FPrate by distance bin

targets.rawSql:
-- This query creates a summary of the True Positive Rate (TPR) and error metrics for each class label.
-- It aggregates counts and calculates mean absolute errors across all datasets, topics, and distance bins.
SELECT
  label,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute x_error for True Positives
  AVG(ABS(x_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_x_error,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute y_error for True Positives
  AVG(ABS(y_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_y_error,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute yaw_error for True Positives
  AVG(ABS(yaw_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_yaw_error,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute vx error
  -- AVG(ABS(vx_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_vx_error
FROM 
  view_eval_flat
WHERE
  ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range)
GROUP BY 
  label
ORDER BY 
  label;

-- This query creates a summary of the True Positive Rate (TPR) and error metrics for each class label.
-- It aggregates counts and calculates mean absolute errors across all datasets, topics, and distance bins.
SELECT
  label,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute x_error for True Positives
  AVG(ABS(x_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_x_error,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute y_error for True Positives
  AVG(ABS(y_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_y_error,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute yaw_error for True Positives
  AVG(ABS(yaw_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_yaw_error,
  -- Calculate the mean absolute vx error
  -- AVG(ABS(vx_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS mean_abs_vx_error
FROM 
  view_eval_flat_comp
WHERE
  ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range)
GROUP BY 
  label
ORDER BY 
  label;

WITH topic_a AS (
    SELECT
      label,
      AVG(ABS(x_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS x_a,
      AVG(ABS(y_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS y_a,
      AVG(ABS(yaw_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS yaw_a
    FROM view_eval_flat
    WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range )
    GROUP BY label
),
topic_b AS (
    SELECT
      label,
      AVG(ABS(x_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS x_b,
      AVG(ABS(y_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS y_b,
      AVG(ABS(yaw_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS yaw_b
    FROM view_eval_flat_comp
    WHERE ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range )
    GROUP BY label
)
SELECT
    a.label,
    (x_b - x_a) AS x_diff,
    (y_b - y_a) AS y_diff,
    (yaw_b - yaw_a) AS yaw_diff
FROM topic_a a
JOIN topic_b b USING (label)
ORDER BY label;

panels.title: Difference of mean absolute error within ${max_eval_range} [m] (comp - target)

panels.description:
tp/fp rate with each t4dataset
descending with tprate
panels.title: t4dataset_wise_tp/fp_rate_visualization

targets.rawSql:
-- Show worst t4dataset_id
SELECT t4dataset_id, tpr FROM tpfp_rate_by_t4dataset_view
ORDER BY tpr ASC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  label,
  COUNT(label) AS unique_label_count
FROM
  view_eval_flat
WHERE
('__all' IN (${t4dataset_id:sqlstring}) OR t4dataset_id IN (${t4dataset_id:sqlstring}))
  AND ('__all' IN (${topic_name:sqlstring})   OR topic_name   IN (${topic_name:sqlstring}))
  AND source = 'GT'
GROUP BY
  label
ORDER BY
  label
--ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(distance_bin, ',', 1), '[', ' ') AS INTEGER);

panels.description: xy error description based on absolute xy error

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    distance_bin,
    quantile_cont(ABS(x_error), 0.5) AS x_error_abs_p50,
    quantile_cont(ABS(x_error), 0.9) AS x_error_abs_p90,
    quantile_cont(ABS(y_error), 0.5) AS y_error_abs_p50,
    quantile_cont(ABS(y_error), 0.9) AS y_error_abs_p90,
    AVG(ABS(x_error)) AS x_error_abs_mean,
    AVG(ABS(y_error)) AS y_error_abs_mean,
    STDDEV_SAMP(ABS(x_error)) AS x_error_abs_std,
    STDDEV_SAMP(ABS(y_error)) AS y_error_abs_std,
FROM view_eval_flat
WHERE source='EST' AND status='TP'
  AND ${topic_label_id_filter:raw}
GROUP BY distance_bin
ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(distance_bin, ',', 1), '[', ' ') AS INTEGER);

panels.title: Detailed XY error panel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  distance_bin,
  COUNT(DISTINCT uuid) AS unique_uuid_count
FROM
  x2_gen2_komatsu_sample_current.main.view_eval_flat
WHERE
  ${topic_label_id_filter:raw}
GROUP BY
  distance_bin
ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(distance_bin, ',', 1), '[', ' ') AS INTEGER);

${view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic:raw}

WITH topic_a AS (
    SELECT
      distance_bin,
      CASE 
        WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)
        ELSE 0
      END AS tpr_a
    FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic
    WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw}
    GROUP BY distance_bin
),
topic_b AS (
    SELECT
      distance_bin,
      CASE 
        WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)
        ELSE 0
      END AS tpr_b
    FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic
    WHERE ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw}
    GROUP BY distance_bin
)
SELECT
    a.distance_bin,
    tpr_a AS ${topic_name},
    tpr_b AS ${compared_topic_name},
    (tpr_b - tpr_a) AS tpr_diff,
    CASE
      WHEN (tpr_b - tpr_a) > 0 THEN '↑'
      WHEN (tpr_b - tpr_a) < 0 THEN '↓'
      ELSE '='
    END AS trend
FROM topic_a a
JOIN topic_b b USING (distance_bin)
ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(distance_bin, ',', 1), '[', ' ') AS INTEGER);

WITH topic_a AS (
    SELECT
      distance_bin,
      CASE 
        WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)
        ELSE 0
      END AS fpr_a
    FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic
    WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw}
    GROUP BY distance_bin
),
topic_b AS (
    SELECT
      distance_bin,
      CASE 
        WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0 THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)
        ELSE 0
      END AS fpr_b
    FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic
    WHERE ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw}
    GROUP BY distance_bin
)
SELECT
    a.distance_bin,
    fpr_a AS ${topic_name},
    fpr_b AS ${compared_topic_name},
    (fpr_b - fpr_a) AS fpr_diff,
    CASE
      WHEN (fpr_b - fpr_a) > 0 THEN '↑'
      WHEN (fpr_b - fpr_a) < 0 THEN '↓'
      ELSE '='
    END AS trend
FROM topic_a a
JOIN topic_b b USING (distance_bin)
ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(SPLIT_PART(distance_bin, ',', 1), '[', ' ') AS INTEGER);

WITH topic_a AS (
    SELECT
      label,
      CASE 
        WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) > 0 
        THEN CAST(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS DOUBLE) 
             / COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN'))
        ELSE 0
      END AS tpr_a
    FROM view_eval_flat
    WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < ${max_eval_range})
    GROUP BY label
),
topic_b AS (
    SELECT
      label,
      CASE 
        WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) > 0 
        THEN CAST(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS DOUBLE) 
             / COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN'))
        ELSE 0
      END AS tpr_b
    FROM view_eval_flat
    WHERE ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < ${max_eval_range})
    GROUP BY label
)
SELECT
    a.label,
    tpr_a AS ${topic_name},
    tpr_b AS ${compared_topic_name},
    (tpr_b - tpr_a) AS TPrate_diff,
    CASE
      WHEN (tpr_b - tpr_a) > 0 THEN '↑'
      WHEN (tpr_b - tpr_a) < 0 THEN '↓'
      ELSE '='
    END AS trend
FROM topic_a a
JOIN topic_b b USING (label)
ORDER BY label;

WITH topic_a AS (
    SELECT
      label,
      AVG(ABS(x_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS x_a,
      AVG(ABS(y_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS y_a,
      AVG(ABS(yaw_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS yaw_a
    FROM view_eval_flat
    WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range )
    GROUP BY label
),
topic_b AS (
    SELECT
      label,
      AVG(ABS(x_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS x_b,
      AVG(ABS(y_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS y_b,
      AVG(ABS(yaw_error)) FILTER (WHERE status = 'TP') AS yaw_b
    FROM view_eval_flat_comp
    WHERE ${compared_topic_label_id_filter:raw} AND (dist_h < $max_eval_range )
    GROUP BY label
)
SELECT
    a.label,
    (x_b - x_a) AS x_diff,
    (y_b - y_a) AS y_diff,
    (yaw_b - yaw_a) AS yaw_diff
FROM topic_a a
JOIN topic_b b USING (label)
ORDER BY label;

panels.title: Difference of mean absolute error within ${max_eval_range} [m] (comp - target)

current.text: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_eval_flat AS WITH base AS (   SELECT     *,     sqrt(CAST(x AS DOUBLE)*CAST(x AS DOUBLE) + CAST(y AS DOUBLE)*CAST(y AS DOUBLE)) AS dist_h   FROM parquet_scan(${target_file:sqlstring})   WHERE x IS NOT NULL AND y IS NOT NULL ), bins AS (   SELECT * FROM (     VALUES       (0.0,   10.0,   '[0,10)',     10),       (10.0,  20.0,   '[10,20)',    20),       (20.0,  30.0,   '[20,30)',    30),       (30.0,  40.0,   '[30,40)',    40),       (40.0,  50.0,   '[40,50)',    50),       (50.0,  60.0,   '[50,60)',    60),       (60.0,  70.0,   '[60,70)',    70),       (70.0,  80.0,   '[70,80)',    80),       (80.0,  90.0,   '[80,90)',    90),       (90.0,  100.0,  '[90,100)',  100),       (100.0, 110.0,  '[100,110)', 110),       (110.0, 120.0,  '[110,120)', 120),       (120.0, 130.0,  '[120,130)', 130),       (130.0, 140.0,  '[130,140)', 140),       (140.0, 150.0,  '[140,150)', 150),       (150.0, 1e12,   '[150,inf)', 160)   ) AS t(bin_start, bin_end, distance_bin, bin_idx) ) SELECT   bse.*,   b.distance_bin,   b.bin_idx,   (status = 'TP') AS is_tp,   (status = 'FP') AS is_fp,   (status = 'FN') AS is_fn FROM base bse JOIN bins b   ON bse.dist_h >= b.bin_start AND bse.dist_h < b.bin_end;
current.value: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_eval_flat AS WITH base AS (   SELECT     *,     sqrt(CAST(x AS DOUBLE)*CAST(x AS DOUBLE) + CAST(y AS DOUBLE)*CAST(y AS DOUBLE)) AS dist_h   FROM parquet_scan(${target_file:sqlstring})   WHERE x IS NOT NULL AND y IS NOT NULL ), bins AS (   SELECT * FROM (     VALUES       (0.0,   10.0,   '[0,10)',     10),       (10.0,  20.0,   '[10,20)',    20),       (20.0,  30.0,   '[20,30)',    30),       (30.0,  40.0,   '[30,40)',    40),       (40.0,  50.0,   '[40,50)',    50),       (50.0,  60.0,   '[50,60)',    60),       (60.0,  70.0,   '[60,70)',    70),       (70.0,  80.0,   '[70,80)',    80),       (80.0,  90.0,   '[80,90)',    90),       (90.0,  100.0,  '[90,100)',  100),       (100.0, 110.0,  '[100,110)', 110),       (110.0, 120.0,  '[110,120)', 120),       (120.0, 130.0,  '[120,130)', 130),       (130.0, 140.0,  '[130,140)', 140),       (140.0, 150.0,  '[140,150)', 150),       (150.0, 1e12,   '[150,inf)', 160)   ) AS t(bin_start, bin_end, distance_bin, bin_idx) ) SELECT   bse.*,   b.distance_bin,   b.bin_idx,   (status = 'TP') AS is_tp,   (status = 'FP') AS is_fp,   (status = 'FN') AS is_fn FROM base bse JOIN bins b   ON bse.dist_h >= b.bin_start AND bse.dist_h < b.bin_end;

list.name: pretask
list.query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_eval_flat AS WITH base AS (   SELECT     *,     sqrt(CAST(x AS DOUBLE)*CAST(x AS DOUBLE) + CAST(y AS DOUBLE)*CAST(y AS DOUBLE)) AS dist_h   FROM parquet_scan(${target_file:sqlstring})   WHERE x IS NOT NULL AND y IS NOT NULL ), bins AS (   SELECT * FROM (     VALUES       (0.0,   10.0,   '[0,10)',     10),       (10.0,  20.0,   '[10,20)',    20),       (20.0,  30.0,   '[20,30)',    30),       (30.0,  40.0,   '[30,40)',    40),       (40.0,  50.0,   '[40,50)',    50),       (50.0,  60.0,   '[50,60)',    60),       (60.0,  70.0,   '[60,70)',    70),       (70.0,  80.0,   '[70,80)',    80),       (80.0,  90.0,   '[80,90)',    90),       (90.0,  100.0,  '[90,100)',  100),       (100.0, 110.0,  '[100,110)', 110),       (110.0, 120.0,  '[110,120)', 120),       (120.0, 130.0,  '[120,130)', 130),       (130.0, 140.0,  '[130,140)', 140),       (140.0, 150.0,  '[140,150)', 150),       (150.0, 1e12,   '[150,inf)', 160)   ) AS t(bin_start, bin_end, distance_bin, bin_idx) ) SELECT   bse.*,   b.distance_bin,   b.bin_idx,   (status = 'TP') AS is_tp,   (status = 'FP') AS is_fp,   (status = 'FN') AS is_fn FROM base bse JOIN bins b   ON bse.dist_h >= b.bin_start AND bse.dist_h < b.bin_end;

current.text: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_eval_flat_comp AS WITH base AS (   SELECT     *,     sqrt(CAST(x AS DOUBLE)*CAST(x AS DOUBLE) + CAST(y AS DOUBLE)*CAST(y AS DOUBLE)) AS dist_h   FROM parquet_scan(${compared_target_file:sqlstring})   WHERE x IS NOT NULL AND y IS NOT NULL ), bins AS (   SELECT * FROM (     VALUES       (0.0,   10.0,   '[0,10)',     10),       (10.0,  20.0,   '[10,20)',    20),       (20.0,  30.0,   '[20,30)',    30),       (30.0,  40.0,   '[30,40)',    40),       (40.0,  50.0,   '[40,50)',    50),       (50.0,  60.0,   '[50,60)',    60),       (60.0,  70.0,   '[60,70)',    70),       (70.0,  80.0,   '[70,80)',    80),       (80.0,  90.0,   '[80,90)',    90),       (90.0,  100.0,  '[90,100)',  100),       (100.0, 110.0,  '[100,110)', 110),       (110.0, 120.0,  '[110,120)', 120),       (120.0, 130.0,  '[120,130)', 130),       (130.0, 140.0,  '[130,140)', 140),       (140.0, 150.0,  '[140,150)', 150),       (150.0, 1e12,   '[150,inf)', 160)   ) AS t(bin_start, bin_end, distance_bin, bin_idx) ) SELECT   bse.*,   b.distance_bin,   b.bin_idx,   (status = 'TP') AS is_tp,   (status = 'FP') AS is_fp,   (status = 'FN') AS is_fn FROM base bse JOIN bins b   ON bse.dist_h >= b.bin_start AND bse.dist_h < b.bin_end;

list.name: view_eval_flat
list.query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_eval_flat AS WITH base AS (   SELECT     *,     sqrt(CAST(x AS DOUBLE)*CAST(x AS DOUBLE) + CAST(y AS DOUBLE)*CAST(y AS DOUBLE)) AS dist_h   FROM parquet_scan(${target_file:sqlstring})   WHERE x IS NOT NULL AND y IS NOT NULL ), bins AS (   SELECT * FROM (     VALUES       (0.0,   10.0,   '[0,10)',     10),       (10.0,  20.0,   '[10,20)',    20),       (20.0,  30.0,   '[20,30)',    30),       (30.0,  40.0,   '[30,40)',    40),       (40.0,  50.0,   '[40,50)',    50),       (50.0,  60.0,   '[50,60)',    60),       (60.0,  70.0,   '[60,70)',    70),       (70.0,  80.0,   '[70,80)',    80),       (80.0,  90.0,   '[80,90)',    90),       (90.0,  100.0,  '[90,100)',  100),       (100.0, 110.0,  '[100,110)', 110),       (110.0, 120.0,  '[110,120)', 120),       (120.0, 130.0,  '[120,130)', 130),       (130.0, 140.0,  '[130,140)', 140),       (140.0, 150.0,  '[140,150)', 150),       (150.0, 1e12,   '[150,inf)', 160)   ) AS t(bin_start, bin_end, distance_bin, bin_idx) ) SELECT   bse.*,   b.distance_bin,   b.bin_idx,   (status = 'TP') AS is_tp,   (status = 'FP') AS is_fp,   (status = 'FN') AS is_fn FROM base bse JOIN bins b   ON bse.dist_h >= b.bin_start AND bse.dist_h < b.bin_end;

current.text: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW tpfp_rate_by_t4dataset_view AS SELECT     t4dataset_id,      CASE          WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0          THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)         ELSE 0     END AS tpr,      CASE          WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0          THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)         ELSE 0     END AS fpr  FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} GROUP BY t4dataset_id ORDER BY tpr DESC;
current.value: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW tpfp_rate_by_t4dataset_view AS SELECT     t4dataset_id,      CASE          WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0          THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)         ELSE 0     END AS tpr,      CASE          WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0          THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)         ELSE 0     END AS fpr  FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} GROUP BY t4dataset_id ORDER BY tpr DESC;

list.name: tpfp_rate_by_t4dataset_view
list.query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW tpfp_rate_by_t4dataset_view AS SELECT     t4dataset_id,      CASE          WHEN SUM(gt_total) > 0          THEN CAST(SUM(tp_gt) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(gt_total)         ELSE 0     END AS tpr,      CASE          WHEN SUM(est_total) > 0          THEN CAST(SUM(fp_est) AS DOUBLE) / SUM(est_total)         ELSE 0     END AS fpr  FROM view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic WHERE ${topic_label_id_filter:raw} GROUP BY t4dataset_id ORDER BY tpr DESC;

current.text: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic AS WITH stats AS (   SELECT     t4dataset_id,     topic_name,     label,     distance_bin,     bin_idx,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) AS gt_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS tp_gt,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status IN ('TP','FP')) AS est_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status='FP') AS fp_est   FROM view_eval_flat   GROUP BY t4dataset_id, topic_name, label, distance_bin, bin_idx ) SELECT   *,   CASE      WHEN gt_total > 0 THEN CAST(tp_gt AS DOUBLE) / gt_total     ELSE NULL   END AS tpr,   CASE      WHEN est_total > 0 THEN CAST(fp_est AS DOUBLE) / est_total     ELSE NULL   END AS fpr FROM stats;
current.value: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic AS WITH stats AS (   SELECT     t4dataset_id,     topic_name,     label,     distance_bin,     bin_idx,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) AS gt_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS tp_gt,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status IN ('TP','FP')) AS est_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status='FP') AS fp_est   FROM view_eval_flat   GROUP BY t4dataset_id, topic_name, label, distance_bin, bin_idx ) SELECT   *,   CASE      WHEN gt_total > 0 THEN CAST(tp_gt AS DOUBLE) / gt_total     ELSE NULL   END AS tpr,   CASE      WHEN est_total > 0 THEN CAST(fp_est AS DOUBLE) / est_total     ELSE NULL   END AS fpr FROM stats;

list.name: view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic
list.query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic AS WITH stats AS (   SELECT     t4dataset_id,     topic_name,     label,     distance_bin,     bin_idx,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) AS gt_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS tp_gt,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status IN ('TP','FP')) AS est_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status='FP') AS fp_est   FROM view_eval_flat   GROUP BY t4dataset_id, topic_name, label, distance_bin, bin_idx ) SELECT   *,   CASE      WHEN gt_total > 0 THEN CAST(tp_gt AS DOUBLE) / gt_total     ELSE NULL   END AS tpr,   CASE      WHEN est_total > 0 THEN CAST(fp_est AS DOUBLE) / est_total     ELSE NULL   END AS fpr FROM stats;

current.text: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_tpr_fpr_by_class_dist_topic_c AS WITH stats AS (   SELECT     t4dataset_id,     topic_name,     label,     distance_bin,     bin_idx,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status IN ('TP','FN')) AS gt_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='GT' AND status='TP') AS tp_gt,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status IN ('TP','FP')) AS est_total,     COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE source='EST' AND status='FP') AS fp_est   FROM view_eval_flat_comp   GROUP BY t4dataset_id, topic_name, label, distance_bin, bin_idx ) SELECT   *,   CASE      WHEN gt_total > 0 THEN CAST(tp_gt AS DOUBLE) / gt_total     ELSE NULL   END AS tpr,   CASE      WHEN est_total > 0 THEN CAST(fp_est AS DOUBLE) / est_total     ELSE NULL   END AS fpr FROM stats;
